title: The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch Recognized With Conde Nast Traveler's 2015 Readers' Choice Award "No. 2 Best Hotels & Resorts in the World" and "No. 1 Resort in the U.S."
text:
The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch
The World's Best Hotels, Resorts, Cities, Islands, Airlines, Airports And Cruise Lines
SARATOGA, Wyo. , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Conde Nast Traveler today announced the results of its 28 th annual Readers' Choice Awards with The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch recognized for the second year in a row as the No.2 Top Hotel & Resort in the World and the No. 1 Resort in the U.S. with a score of 99.529.
"Our goal is to provide an exceptional experience to every single guest that visits The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch," said Mike Williams , EVP and COO of The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch. "To be named the No. 2 Resort in the World and the No. 1 Resort in the U.S. for the second year in a row by one of the foremost travel publications in the world is an incredible honor for our entire staff and reinforces our dedication to putting our heart and soul into the guest experiences we deliver each day amidst the stunning landscape of Wyoming's American West."
Conde Nast Traveler announced the results of its 28 th annual Readers' Choice Awards, ranking the best hotels, resorts, cities, islands, airlines, and cruise lines in the world on October 20 th . Over 128,000 dedicated readers cast votes for over 5,000 hotels, hundreds of cities and islands, dozens of cruise ships, airlines and airports, and in an average survey time of twenty minutes. The result? More than 1,500 of the best travel experiences in the world.
The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch, a Preferred Hotels & Resorts LEGEND collection resort and ORVIS dual-endorsed fly-fishing and wingshooting lodge, is an exclusive, independent guest ranch set amid a century-old working cattle ranch outside of Saratoga in south central Wyoming's North Platte River Valley. Sitting on 30,000 acres and bordering a million acres of Medicine Bow National Forest wild lands, Brush Creek Ranch's Grand Lodge and collection of new and renovated historic guest cabins and quarters are open to grand family vacations, inspiring adult escapes, destination weddings and private corporate retreats. Offering an unsurpassed, all-inclusive luxury dude ranch adventure experience, The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch provides a genuine Western spirit of hospitality and a vast array of outdoor activities that, coupled with an inspiring landscape and a dedication to sustainable ranching, come together to create a new icon in luxury Western destinations. For more information about The Lodge & Spa at Brush Creek Ranch or to inquire about rates call (307) 327-5284, email guestservices@brushcreekranch.com or visit www.BrushCreekRanch.com or on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
The Conde Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards are the longest-running and most prestigious recognition of excellence in the travel industry and are commonly known as "the best of the best of travel." Under Editor in Chief Pilar Guzman , the Readers' Choice Awards have become more selective and specific to the passions that inspire today's travelers.
The Readers' Choice Awards are announced in the November issue of Conde Nast Traveler , on newsstands nationwide on October 28, 2015 . The full list is published exclusively online, at www.CNTraveler.com/rca .
